CustomField.description: Contains a unique ID made up of the Project ID and related Catalog Indicator ID. This is populated by Flow when adding an Indicator from the Catalogue (via the "Create Project indicator flow), ensuring that there are no duplicate Project Indicators,
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contains a unique ID made up of the Project ID and related Catalog Indicator ID. This is populated by Flow when adding an Indicator from the Catalogue (via the "Create Project indicator flow), ensuring that there are no duplicate Project Indicators,
CustomField.label: Catalogue Source Unique ID
